effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.

short_effect.black_white: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black_white: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
